title: Spartacus Fartacus: An Improvised Journey Through History
description:
Let's get historical!

The pageant of history is a rich tapestry of both people and events... a journey from the then to the now.  History's importance cannot be discounted, for those who fail to acknowledge and learn from the mistakes of history shall be forever doomed to repeat them. Or some shit like that...

Spartacus Fartacus is Brad McMurran, Sean Devereux, and Ed Carden. 3 men seeking to bring history to life in the form of original improvised entertainment!

It starts with the audience suggestion of a historical event or figure, and then explodes into a great trek through the ages with only Brad, Ed, and Sean's knowledge of history (or lack thereof) as a guide.

It's like Bill and Ted's Excellent Adventure... but not as smart.

***This will be a very special Brad's Birthday Spartacus!!! Don't miss it.***





Spartacus Fartacus: An Improvised Journey Through History

Saturday. November 16th at 8pm

Tickets are $5

The Push Comedy Theater only has 99 seats, so we recommend you get your tickets in advance.

title: ComicKaze presents There Is No Santa Claus (In This Show)
description:
Mid-November is far too early for a Christmas-themed Sketch Comedy show, so ComicKaze Sketch Comedy feat. The Dumpster Dudes assures you that THERE IS NO SANTA CLAUS... in this show. If you come to see this show, you will see hilarious, non-festive comedy scenes, and what won’t you see? Santa Claus, because SANTA DOESN’T EXIST... in this show. Just to be clear, Santa Claus is an absolute fabrication that no fool, no matter how young, should ever believe in... in this show. COMEDY!

ComicKaze presents There Is No Santa Claus (In This Show) feat. The Dumpster Dudes
November 16th | 10PM | $10
------------
ComicKaze is the stray puppy of the Push Comedy Theater. Adorable and dirty. Playful and rambunctious. Likely to pee on your floor.
Featuring Kasey Kennedy, Austin Johnson, Alex Weller, Patrick C. Taylor, Trip Rumble, and special guests Yasmeen Freightman & Erika Guess, ComicKaze has been making sketch comedy videos for years and made their Push Comedy Theater debut with a winning set in Sketchmageddon, as well as performing at Philly Sketch Fest and the Virginia Beach Funny Bone.
------------
Dumpster Dudes
The semi-undefeated Sketchmageddon champions, Dumpster Dudes, bring the funny. They’ve discovered that the key to comedy is jokes, and lots of them! They perform sketches that are both funny and on stage. You’ll love how dedicated they are to making humorous quips and witticisms for you, live! You’ll think they made it all up, but they didn’t, it was written. 
Dumpster Dudes. Live on stage sketch comedy.
--------------
The Push Comedy Theater is a 99 seat venue in the heart of Norfolk's brand new Arts District. Founded by local comedy group The Pushers, the Push Comedy Theater is dedicated to bringing you live comedy from the best local and national acts.
The Push Comedy Theater hosts live sketch, improv and stand-up comedy on Friday and Saturday nights. During the week classes are offered in stand-up, sketch and improv comedy as well as acting.

title: Storytelling Night: Wrath
description:
Rescheduled to Nov. 17!!

Real people, Real Stories.

Tell Me More... Live Storytelling is a podcast recorded live at the Push Comedy Theater. Each month real people tell real stories inspired by a one-word theme. 

Theme: Wrath
Admission: $5.

Visit www.tellmemorelive.org for podcast episodes and to pitch a story idea.

title: Class Dismissed: The Improv 101 Grad Show
description:
Dust off those caps and gowns... because it's graduation time at the Push.

Check out the Push Comedy Theater's Improv 101 class as they show off their comedy chops.

You won't believe what these improv newcomers have in store for you!!!

Class Dismissed: The Improv 101 Graduation ShowTuesday, November 19th at 8pmTickets are $5

The Push Comedy Theater only has 99 seats, so we recommend you get your tickets in advance.

--

The Push Comedy Theater is a 99 seat venue in the heart of Norfolk's brand new Arts District. Founded by local comedy group The Pushers, the Push Comedy Theater is dedicated to bringing you live comedy from the best local and national acts. The Push Comedy Theater hosts will host live sketch and improv comedy on Friday and Saturday nights. During the week classes are offered in sketch writing, improv comedy and acting.

Whether you're a die-hard comedy lover or a casual fan... a seasoned performer or someone who's never stepped foot on stage... the Push Comedy Theater has something for you.

title: The Push Comedy Theater 5th Anniversary Bash
description:
They said it couldn't be done...  They said it shouldn't be done...
Despite the odds (and it's dipsh*tty owners), the Push Comedy Theater is turning 5 years old!!!!

To celebrate the fact that we're still open, we are throwing the anniversary bash to end all anniversary bashes!!!

We're cramming a year's worth of comedy into one amazing show and the best part is you, the audience will choose what sketches we perform!!!

How exactly will this work, you ask... you're going to have to come to the show to find out.

**Special Guests**
Girl-Prov: Girls' Night Of Improv At The Push
Sketch Me Like One of Your French Girls
ComicKaze Sketch Comedy
The Bright Side Sketch & Improv Comedy
The Pushers

More to be Announced!

The Push Comedy Theater 5th Anniversary Bash
Saturday, November 23rd at 9pm.
Tickets are $15.
Special 9pm Start Time!!!!

title: The Improv Riot: The Short Form Improv Show
description:
Get ready for short form (Whose Line is it Anyway?) improv at the Push Comedy Theater.

You demanded it! So now it's here!!! Our very own short form improv show. All the fun of Whose Line is it Anyway... right here in Downtown Norfolk.

The Improv Riot: The Short Form Improv Show

The last Friday of every month, 8pm

Tickets are $5

The Push Comedy Theater only has 99 seats, so we recommend you get your tickets in advance.

title: The Improv Riot After Dark: The Short Form Improv Show
description:
It's your favorite short-form improv show... with a twist.

The Improv Riot After Dark takes all your fun improv games and gives them an adult spin.  Where the regular Improv Riot tries to stay PG13ish, Improv Riot After Dark will definitely be R rated.

title: Fake News The Musical
description:
Ripped from today's headlines!!!!

Fake News the Musical is a fully improvised, musical news show. The audience supplies the headlines, we sing the news.

The day's top stories never sounded so good.

Don't miss this amazing show as they debut a brand new cast.

Fake News the Musical

Tickets are $5.



-------

title: IMPROVAGEDDON: THE ULTIMATE IMPROV COMPETITION
description:
Prepare for Glory!!

Prepare for IMPROVAGEDDON: The Ultimate Improv Competition!!!

Who will raise the Hammer of Lowell in final victory? You'll have to come to this month's show to find out!

3 teams will be given just 15 minutes to perform any style of improv comedy they choose... all in a quest to be declared Improvageddon champ and raise the Hammer of Lowell in final victory.

This ain't your daddy's Improv cage match! If you think you've seen Improv competitions before then you ain't seen nothin yet!

Improvageddon combines Improv Comedy with stylistic elements of Professional Wrestling to create a truly unique, and most definitely over-the-top Improv contest.

Gimmicks will be displayed! Trash will be talked! Feats of comedic strength will be performed!

Let the final war for comedic supremacy begin!

IMPROVAGEDDON: The Ultimate Improv Competition!The last Saturday of every month

The show starts at 10:00pm

Tickets are $5

The Push Comedy Theater only has 99 seats, so we recommend you get your tickets in advance.

title: Date Night: An Improvised Story of Love
description:
Get ready as we improvise your relationship.

It's the most fun you'll ever have on date night!

Two lucky couples will see their love unfold on stage through the interpretation of 2 of Hampton Roads' wackiest improvisers!

The couples will be selected at random and interviewed on stage in front of the audience. Using the information they learn, and their imagination, Brad and Alba will show the story of the couples' love.

For years, The Pushers have been getting to know diverse couples all across Hampton Roads with this signature piece. Normally this is a piece within a larger show. This time, Brad and Alba are out to explore as much as possible by bringing it to you as its own show!



Date Night: An Improvised Story of Love

First Friday of the Month at 8:00 PM

Tickets are $10

---

The Pushers are Virginia's premiere sketch and improv comedy group. For more than 11 years they have thrilled (and shocked) audiences with their wild antics both on and off stage. The group puts on a racy, high-octane, energetic show that is guaranteed to have audiences howling with laughter. In November of 2014, they opened their own theater, The Push Comedy Theater, located in the new Norfolk Arts District.

In 2013 The Pushers' Off-Broadway musical Cuff Me: The Unauthorized Fifty Shades of Grey Musical Parody debuted in New York City. It ran for over a year in both New York and Chicago. A third production is currently touring the country.

The Pushers have appeared at both The Charleston Comedy Festival and The North Carolina Comedy Arts Festival. In New York, they have performed at The People's Improv Theater, The Upright Citizen's Brigade and at The Kraine Theater in New York's East Village.

Here in Hampton Roads the group have performed most notably at The Jewish Mother, The NorVa and The Virginia Beach Funnybone.

---

The Push Comedy Theater is a 99 seat venue in the heart of Norfolk's brand new Arts District. Founded by local comedy group The Pushers, the Push Comedy Theater is dedicated to bringing you live comedy from the best local and national acts.

The Push Comedy Theater hosts live sketch, improv and stand-up comedy on Friday and Saturday nights. During the week classes are offered in stand-up, sketch and improv comedy as well as acting.

Whether you're a die-hard comedy lover or a casual fan... a seasoned performer or someone who's never stepped foot on stage... the Push Comedy Theater has something for you.

title: SKETCHMAGEDDON: The Ultimate Sketch Comedy Competition
description:
Last month, Sketch Me Outside did what no other team has  done... won 5 Sketchmageddons in a row.  Can anyone defeat them???

--

Get ready for a sketch comedy show like no other!!!

SKETCHMAGEDDON takes three groups and forces them to compete in an all-out comedy deathmatch!

Each team will be given 15 minutes to dazzle you with their comedy prowess. It's Saturday Night Live meets Thunderdome!!!!

Unlike its improvised sister show IMPROVAGEDDON, SKETCHMAGEDDON features all written and rehearsed material.  Props, costumes, and special effects are all legal in SKETCHMAGEDDON.

This is a completely experimental show.  You never know what you are going to see.

SKETCHMAGEDDON: The Ultimate Sketch Comedy Competition

The first Saturday of the month at 10pm.

Tickets are $5

------------

The Push Comedy Theater only has 99 seats, so we recommend you get your tickets in advance.
